Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were used for in vitro phosphorylation studies.

Readout description.Result Description: W437X mutation impaired PINK1's ability to phosphorylate TRAP1.
G309D mutation decreased TRAP1 phosphorylation by 60%.
L347P mutation reduced TRAP1 phosphorylation by 50%.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each mutation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: TRAP1 phosphorylation greater than 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: TRAP1 phosphorylation less than 50% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were used to assess cell viability after oxidative stress.

Readout description.Result Description: W437X mutation increased cell death by 40% under oxidative stress.
G309D mutation increased cell death by 30% under oxidative stress.
L347P mutation increased cell death by 25% under oxidative stress.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each mutation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% under oxidative stress.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% under oxidative stress.
